title: EVs 2025 — It Was The Best Of Times, It Was The Worst Of Times
description:
The US has weakened its exhaust emissions standards and the EU has abandoned its ZEV mandate by 2035 policy. What happens next?

The post EVs 2025 — It Was The Best Of Times, It Was The Worst Of Times appeared first on CleanTechnica.
